com.apriori.concurrent.atoms

Interface AsynchronousAtom.ErrorHandler<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the handled atom's value
    Enclosing class:
    AsynchronousAtom<T>

    public static interface AsynchronousAtom.ErrorHandler<T>
    Handles errors that occur during a mutation operation on an atom.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AsynchronousAtom.ErrorAction onError(AsynchronousAtom<? extends T> atom, Throwable failure)
      Handles an error.

    • Method Detail

      • onError

        AsynchronousAtom.ErrorAction onError(AsynchronousAtom<? extends T> atom,
                                     Throwable failure)
        Handles an error. The action returned is what determines how the atom will proceed with respect to subsequent mutation operations.
        Parameters:
        atom - the atom for which a mutation failed
        failure - the cause of the failure
        Returns:
        the action to take
